rules.description: Remap Caps Lock to CTRL if used in combination with other keys, otherwise map it to F18.
Remap SPACE to Hyper (ctrl + alt + cmd) if used in combination with other keys, otherwise map it to SPACE.
Map volume controls to fine volume controls (Option + Shift + Volume)
Mac OSX RDP: Cmd+Left/Right to Home/End
Mac OSX RDP: Cmd+Shift+Left/Right to Shift+Home/End
Mac OSX RDP: Cmd+Tab to Alt+Tab
Mac OSX RDP: Copy/Paste/Cut - Cmd+c/Cmd+v/Cmd+x to Ctrl+c/Ctrl+v/Ctrl+x
Mac OSX RDP: Option+(Shift+)Left/Right to Ctrl+(Shift+)Left/Right
Mac OSX RDP: Undo - Cmd+z to Ctrl+z
Mac OSX RDP: Redo -  Cmd+Shift+z to Ctrl+Shift+z
Mac OSX RDP: Select-All - Cmd+(Shift+)a to Ctrl+(Shift+)a
Mac OSX RDP: Save - Cmd+(shift+)s to Ctrl+(Shift+)s
Mac OSX RDP: New - Cmd+(shift+)n to Ctrl+(Shift+)n
Mac OSX RDP: Browser: Reload page - Cmd+(Shift+)r to (Ctrl+)F5
Mac OSX RDP: Browser: Open location - Cmd+l to Ctrl+L
Mac OSX RDP: New Tab - Cmd+(Shift+)t to Ctrl+(Shift)t
Mac OSX RDP: Browser: Open DevTools - Cmd+Shift+i to Ctrl+Shift+i
Mac OSX RDP: Find - Cmd+(shift+)f to Ctrl+(Shift+)f
Mac OSX RDP: Open - Cmd+(shift+)o to Ctrl+(Shift+)o
Mac OSX RDP: Close Window - Cmd+(shift+)w to Ctrl+(Shift+)w
Mac OSX RDP: Fn+Space To Switch Input (Left Shift+Left Alt)
Mac OSX RDP: Cmd+Space To Switch Input (Left Shift+Left Alt)
Mac OSX RDP: Cmd+Space To Switch Input (Left Shift+Left Ctrl)
Mac OSX RDP: Quit Application -  Cmd+q to Alf+F4
Mac OSX RDP: Code: Comment out -  Cmd+/ to Ctrl+/
